Key Match Events: Gerardo Arteaga scored a goal from the edge of the box in the 69th minute to give Mexico the winner
Post-Match Reflections: Jaime Lozano will need to improve the attack if Mexico wants to make a run in the tournament
Losing Edson Alvarez is a significant blow to the team
Miscellaneous Highlights: Edson Alvarez was injured in the 30th minute with a hamstring injury
